compatibility.notes: The Caldera license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in all redistributions.
license.name: Caldera
obligations: Retain the copyright notice in redistributions of source code.
Include the license and conditions in redistributions of binary form.
Acknowledge Caldera International, Inc. in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software.
Obtain prior written permission to use the name of Caldera International, Inc. or other contributors for endorsement or promotion.
